answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Consult a doctor to rule out pinched nerve in the cervical spine area, high blood pressure, anemia, low Vit B12, hypothyroidism or diabetes. Take up yoga and activities that relax you. Cut down of coffee, if you take regularly. Take care!

question: Hi Doctor,My problem is very wierd. Sometime my mind gets blank and have pain starting from back brain to my ears. It also makes my mind numb sometime and i can not be able to concentrate on one thing on one time. Lack of Concentration is big issue. Please Help otherwise i will do something else.Please
title: I can not Concentrate
